00007 function pre_print_r($var){
00008         global $config;
00009         if($config->development_environment){
00010             echo "<pre>";
00011             print_r($var);
00012             echo "</pre>";
00013         } else {
00014             throw new Exception('pre_print_r is in use in a production environment');
00015         }
00016 }

00036 function pre_debug_backtrace(){
00037         global $config;
00038         if($config->development_environment){

00047 function pre_trace(){
00048         global $config;
00049         if($config->development_environment){
00050                 $debug = debug_backtrace();
00051                 $trace = '<div class="trace">';
00052                 foreach($debug as $level=>$d){
00053                         $trace .= "Level: {$level}\n";
00054                         if(isset($d['file'])){
00055                                 $trace .= "{$d['file']}\n";
00056                         }
00057                         if(isset($d['line'])){
00058                                 $trace .= "{$d['line']}\n";
00059                         }
00060                         if(isset($d['class'])){
00061                                 $trace .= "{$d['class']}\n";
00062                         }
00063                         if(isset($d['function'])){
00064                                 $trace .= "{$d['function']}\n";
00065                         }
00066                         $trace .= "<hr />\n";
00067                 }
00068                 $trace .= '</div>';
00069                 pre_print_r($trace);
00070         }
00071 }

00095 function sAssert($code=null){
00096         global $config;
00097         if($config->deveopment_environment){
00098                 @assert_options(ASSERT_ACTIVE,          true);
00099                 @assert_options(ASSERT_WARNING,         false);
00100                 @assert_options(ASSERT_QUIET_EVAL,      true);
00101                 @assert_options(ASSERT_BAIL,            true);
00102                 @assert_options(ASSERT_CALLBACK,        'sAssertHandler');
00103                 assert($code);
00104         }
00105 }
